SurvivalCheck_PAD.how_to_trigger: After spotting the tracks with a successful perception check, the player can interact with any of the clues to trigger the survival check.

PAD.synopsis: The player spots a sign of Thulla's escape: footprints. Player wishes to take a closer look.
